channel.title: I Atmosphere Factory:: a silent wish (80s ambient)
channel.description:
1980s style old-school ambient, in the style of Harold Budd. Featuring the Noir piano, and the arps are imported as samples from Groovebox.
https://soundcloud.com/dakini-records/a-silent-wish
